content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to the opinions or reactions of specific fans or critics. However, I can provide some general information about the song's reception.

According to various online music platforms like Spotify and YouTube, "This Side" has been well-received by listeners, with many positive reviews and comments. The song's introspective lyrics and emotive vocals connect with those who are struggling through feelings of loneliness and the desirous of human connection that could be relatable to a large audience. 

Some music critics have also praised "This Side." For instance, one review on a music blog commends the song's "simple yet beautiful" melodies and notes the artist's ability to capture the emotion of longing in the lyrics. 

Overall, it seems that "This Side" has resonated with many people, both through its popularity with audiences and its positive critical reception.
